Package model.item.tools.concrete_tool.iron_tool

Class IronScissors

java.lang.Object
model.item.Item
model.item.tools.AbstractTool
model.item.tools.concrete_tool.iron_tool.IronScissors
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable, Cloneable, Comparable<Item>, ItemInterface, ToolInterface
public class IronScissors extends AbstractTool
This class represents the IronScissors tool, which is a specific type of Tool within the system. It extends the AbstractTool class, inheriting its fields and methods. The IronScissors tool has specific attributes such as type, material, status, price, and number.
